short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clicks the hide button for ads on kissanime.com, kisscartoon.me, and kissasian.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kiss* AdHider hides ads on the video pages of kissanime.com, kisscartoon.me, and kissasian.com. You can choose the number of ads you want to hide so you can reach a middle ground between helping out the site and having a ton of ads bogging your browser down.
